name: Cornivore
description:
An Action-Farming game! You have to defend your farm from evil wormies while growing it. If you leave the fruit unharvested too long they get angry as well! There are machines around too… They take your fruit and give you things. Seeds, hoes, fertilizer, and… HATS. Your bald head was a bit exposed, huh. Why not get a hat and cover up, be a bit safe, recover a bit more…

Controls (Joystick Recommended)

Move: WASD or left joystick

Scroll Inventory: Arrow Keys or DPad

Plant/Harvest/Interact: E or A or Left Click

Attack: B or Space or Right Click

Menu: Start or Escape
